text:
As you know, a portion of our grant funding comes from the State of Washington. These funds are allocated only after approval by a budget process every two years. This year the competition for funds is very stiff given COVID concerns, so, we need all the help we can get from our teams.
 
The budget process for the next two years is happening NOW-this month. Without these funds we will not have the opportunity to offer "OSPI" grants to schools/teams. 
 
*Your immediate help is really important, here is what we'd like you to do-*
 
Pick a student (or small group of students) to write a letter to either their State Representative or Senator (Or can be titled Dear Representative or Senator or both) by leveraging the template that is attached. We would love them to use their own voice and speak about how this program has helped them with a specific focus on how _FIRST_ pivoted in a COVID year so it could continue to provide programming in a remote learning environment.
 
Here is the template:
 
Dear Representative or Senator <Last Name>,
 
My name is <xxxxxxx> and I am a member of <FIRST Tech Challenge (FTC)/FIRST Robotics Competition (FRC)>Team <xxx>. My role within the team is as <xxxxx>.
 
I am writing to you today to thank you for your past support of Legislative initiatives promoting STEM programs in Washington State. In the current biennium, the Legislature allocated $1,075,000 per year for FIRST robotics programs in the Operating Budget (through the Superintendent of Public Instruction’s Grants and Pass Through Funding). In December, Governor Inslee also included this same funding in his proposed 2021-2023 Operating Budget. We would love to see these funds included in the House and Senate’s proposed Operating Budgets and were hoping you might be able to assist in advocating for their inclusion.
 
 
The FTC/FRC program is important to me for several reasons:
1. Xxxxx
2. Xxxxx
3. Xxxxx
4. Xxxxx
 
Thank you very much in advance for consideration of our request. We look forward to seeing you once competitions go in-person!
 
With gratitude,
<First Name> <Last Name>
 
Once you have completed your letter, use <http://r20.rs6.net/tn.jsp?f=001K1sZLG9pVZMlmY8LcG74ykrlsqKmW-tVwXhWDVh52z0R-tylQuIDHqe0xtTyG__EMszHX0Z7nHjgZ0acOy2Mg2El4zbmQ9CY1PUqhHfYYOtZIeKfckbXR6pwnlXNpMZxa6OTpGYiILRbTzGSm4tEWDrmEUN1VMOBJP6cc_pqSQ37TaF6TkWtC1Lylo3_ORM9D2jAFtGPZYs=&c=eGfD8nRlNcegbyglQlEDOhycMQFDP3l_A1shigwl_eaODGOHRSBp9g==&ch=dovPukKNwIvmWerJ-mssyHiY-8CuuAekybhdlkC7GfFL1qgL3zE4qw==|this form >to upload it. Because this is time sensitive, please have your letter uploaded by *5:00 pm Tuesday, February 9.*
